item.title: A group representing hostages' families said the Israeli government "chose to give up the hostages" held in Gaza, after strikes by the Israeli military killed more than 400 Palestinians, according to the Hamas-run health ministry. #Gaza #Israel #Jerusalem

item.title: More than 400 people have been killed by Israeli air strikes on Gaza, according to the Hamas-run health ministry. The Israeli military said it's hitting "terror targets" across Gaza after talks to extend the ceasefire failed. #Gaza #Israel #MiddleEast #Mi
